description: Other players can cut your leaves with shears for leaves and other items and prune you with axes for wood, being pruned with an axe will make you shrink.

badges.text: You can cut your own leaves by right clicking with shears on your offhand, this will give you leaves and something found on it.
You can prune by right clicking with any axe in your offhand, this will hurt you, give you some wood and will make you shrink.
You can be bone mealed by other players, this will heal you but will also make you grow.
